name: Through The Ringer
description:
Summary ~

Through The Ringer is a small, simple local multiplayer fighting game themed around boxing. Manage stamina, keep your guard, and jab at your opponent to win.

Controls ~ Player 1 (left half of keyboard)

- WASD to move

- V to punch

- B to block

Player 2 (right half of keyboard)

- numpad8, numpad4, numpad5, numpad6 to move

- / (slash) to punch

- . (period) to block

Apologies if the game crashes when your first run it. This is rare but possible. Also, there is a fairly long loading screen before you start the game. Apologies for that as well.

This is my first ever finished game, so apologies for lack of controller support and simple moveset. I would like to add more, but I am inexperienced and poor at optimization.

Music by Gigakoops.
